name: Perspective Pup
description:
Play as a pup fetching a lost ball for her brother. 

Solve levels in 2D...

Inspired by FEZ and Super Paper Mario, Perspective Pup's levels require rotating the 2D camera by 90 degree increments to navigate a 3D world in 2D. The 2D camera angle allows the player to jump to far off platforms as if they were just next to them.

...Or 3D!

Shift the camera into 3D to get a better view of your surroundings, uncovering new paths through the level. A wall in your way? Switch to 3D and walk around it!

Climb your way through 15 levels to return your brother's lost ball!

Specs

Windows (32 or 64 bit) - Sorry mac/linux gamers :( 
You also need a keyboard lol

Controls

  • WASD: Move (W and S to move forward/backward in 3D)
  • Space: Jump
  • Q/E: Rotate the perspective clockwise/anti-clockwise (Unlocked during 1st level)
  • Left Shift: Switch between 2D and 3D (Unlocked on level 4)

Credits
